author: PaulHigin
body: We currently don't have SSH remoting tests because there is no way to automatically set up SSH.  Setting up SSH will be addressed by Enable-SSHRemoting (Issue #3616).  And once this is working we need to begin adding SSH remoting tests.

comments.author: PaulHigin
comments.body: Un-assigning since I am not actively working on this.

title: Create SSH remoting tests
